FuncDef:
The peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command activates the g-shut feature for a peer group.
The undo peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command restores the default configuration. The peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command activates the g-shut feature for a peer group. The undo peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command restores the default configuration. By default, the g-shut feature of a peer group is not activated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo: To activate the g-shut feature for a peer group, run this command.
